valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 21 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 22 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Shannon 970 expected west of Bailey 975 by midday tomorrow. New low expected just west of FitzRoy 976 by same time
